member.name: M:Stump.BaseCore.Framework.Threading.TaskExtensions.WaitForCompletionStatus(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)

member.returns: The completion status of the task.
member.remarks: Unlike Wait, this method will not throw an exception if the task ends in the Faulted or Canceled state.
